# STS proposal comparison

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
theme_set(theme_bw(16) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust = 1),
                               strip.background = element_blank()))

ess <- read.csv('output/ess_calls.csv', as.is=TRUE)
# R 3.1.0 "change"/bug
ess <- transform(ess, last_ess = as.numeric(last_ess))

ess$by_length <- ifelse(ess$by_length == 'True', 'by length', 'by edge')
```

## Partials updates:

Number of likelihood calls required by various proposal methods:

```{r, fig.width = 12}
p <- ggplot(ess, aes(x = paste(proposal_method, by_length), y = likelihood_calls)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_grid(n_taxa ~ trim_count) +
  scale_y_log10()
print(p)
```

## ... and effective sample size:

```{r, fig.width = 12}
p <- ggplot(ess, aes(x = paste(proposal_method, by_length), y = last_ess)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_grid(n_taxa ~ trim_count)
print(p)
```

## Comparing the two

```{r, fig.width = 12}
p <- ggplot(ess, aes(x = paste(proposal_method, by_length), y = likelihood_calls / last_ess)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_grid(n_taxa ~ trim_count, scales = 'free_y') +
  scale_y_log10() +
  xlab('Proposal method') +
  ylab('# of partials updates per unit ESS')
print(p)
```

## Split probabilities

```{r, fig.width = 14}
df <- read.csv('output/pp_comparison.csv', as.is = TRUE)
df[, c('pp1', 'pp2')] <- sapply(df[, c('pp1', 'pp2')], as.numeric)
# Single leaf trimming
df <- transform(subset(df, !grepl('-', trim_taxon)),
                proposal = paste(proposal_method, 'by', ifelse(by_length == 'True', 'length', 'edge')))

p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = pp1, y = pp2, color = type)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(n_taxa ~ proposal, scales = 'free_y') +
  coord_equal() +
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
print(p)

# Coefficient of determination
rsq <- group_by(df, type, proposal, n_taxa) %>%
  summarize(r_sq = 1 - sum((pp2 - pp1)^2) / sum((pp2 - mean(pp2))^2),
            mse = mean((pp1 - pp2)^2)) %>%
  gather(variable, value, r_sq:mse) %>%
  unite(var, variable, type) %>%
  spread(var, value) %>%
  select(-`mse_mrbayes-mrbayes`) %>%
  arrange(-`r_sq_mrbayes-sts`)
```

#### Coefficient of determination
```{r, results = 'asis'}
kable(rsq)
```

## ASDSF

[Average Standard Deviation of Split Frequencies (ASDSF)](http://www.bali-phy.org/README.html#idp54307728)

```{r, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10}
library(stringr)
asdsf <- read.csv('output/asdsf.csv', as.is=TRUE)

asdsf$by_length <- ifelse(asdsf$by_length == 'True', 'by length', 'by edge')
asdsf <- transform(asdsf, proposal = paste(proposal_method, by_length),
                   n_trimmed = paste('trim', str_count(trim_taxon, '-') + 1),
                   n_taxa = paste(n_taxa, 'taxa'))

p <- ggplot(asdsf, aes(x = proposal, y = asdsf, fill=type)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0.01, linetype = 'dashed') +
  facet_grid(n_trimmed ~ n_taxa) +
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
print(p)
```
